text: Nayata tomara jan'ya hoka ekati sonara tairi ghara, athaba tumi akase arohana karabe. Ara amara kakhano tomara urdhbarohane bisbasa karaba na yataksana na tumi amadera jan'ya eka kitaba namiye ano -- ya amara parate pari.’’ Balo, -- ''sakala mahima amara prabhura! Ami ki ekajana manusa -- ekajana rasula chara an'ya kichu?’’
